metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13457 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Open Ticket Request System (OTRS) 7.0.x through 7.0.8. A customer user can use the search results to disclose information from their "company" tickets (with the same CustomerID), even when the CustomerDisableCompanyTicketAccess setting is turned on.

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
